categories: Category:Imperial Navy admirals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Jyrom Ottdell was an admiral of the Galactic Empire's Imperial Navy and Imperial Officer Corps. In 1 BBY, Ottdell was murdered using poisonous zolall extract, causing Agent Andressa Divo to begin an investigation into the group known as the Malkite poisoners. As part of the investigation, Divo ordered several "Malkite poisoner kits" through the HoloNet, all of which turned out to be fake bar one, which contained an inscription warning the agent to drop the investigation.
Jyrom Ottdell was first mentioned in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
